plants.Name: Medium Sago Palm
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north-facing window. Water every 10-14 days (when the first inch of the soil dries)

plants.Name: MEDIUM PINK ANTHURIUM
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north-facing window, and can live in low light ie; a dark room with little natural light. Water every 10-14 days (when the first inch of the soil dries)

plants.Name: MEDIUM CALADIUM LINDENII
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north facing window, Also can be in shady areas ie; away from a bright window. Water every 10-14 days (when the first inch of the soil dries)

plants.Name: MEDIUM PHILODENDRON 'BRANDI'
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north facing window, Also can be in shady areas ie; away from a bright window. Water every 10-14 days (when the first inch of the soil dries)

plants.Name: LARGE MONSTERA DELICIOSA
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north facing window, also can be in shady areas ie; away from a bright window, also can live in low light ie; a dark room with little natural light. Water thoroughly every 2 weeks (when the first 2 inches of soil dries)

plants.Name: LARGE SNAKE PLANT (TRIFASCIATA)
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north facing window, also can be in shady areas ie; away from a bright window, also can live in low light ie; a dark room with little natural light. Water thoroughly every 2 weeks (when the first 2 inches of soil dries)

plants.Name: SMALL WATERMELON PEPEROMIA
plants.Detail: Also can live in low light ie; a dark room with little natural light. Water thoroughly every 5-7 days (when the first inch of soil dries)

plants.Name: SMALL CHINESE EVERGREEN 'WISHES' (AGLAONEMA)
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north facing window. Water thoroughly every 2 weeks (when the first 2 inches of soil dries)

plants.Name: MEDIUM CALATHEA PINSTRIPE
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north facing window, Also can be in shady areas ie; away from a bright window. Water every 10-14 days (when the first inch of the soil dries)

plants.Name: MEDIUM MARANTA LEUCONEURA
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north facing window, Also can be in shady areas ie; away from a bright window, Also can live in low light ie; a dark room with little natural light. Water every 10-14 days (when the first inch of the soil dries)

plants.Name: MEDIUM SCINDAPSUS TREUBII 'MOONLIGHT'
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north facing window, Also can be in shady areas ie; away from a bright window, Also can live in low light ie; a dark room with little natural light. Water every 10-14 days (when the first inch of the soil dries)

plants.Name: MEDIUM BEGONIA 'MACULATA' (ANGEL WINGS)
plants.Detail: Takes indirect bright light ie; a north facing window, Also can be in shady areas ie; away from a bright window. Water every 10-14 days (when the first inch of the soil dries)
